subject: Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Despite a perjury indictment in baseball, illegal dogfighting in pro football, a referee scandal in pro basketball, sports’ little corner of the world still has many people to be thankful for today.
snippet: Despite a perjury indictment in baseball, illegal dogfighting in pro football, a referee scandal in pro basketball, sports’ little corner of the world still has many people to be thankful for today.
